metadata.Title: CVE-2014-4946 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Horde Internet Mail Program (IMP) before 6.1.8, as used in Horde Groupware Webmail Edition before 5.1.5, allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via (1) unspecified flags or (2) a mailbox name in the dynamic mailbox view.

criterions.comment: php-horde-imp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
